LanguageData.EEAP.Title: Easy Extra Apparel Layers
LanguageData.EEAP.bodyYSpacePatchDesc: Effects apparel lower than the 'Shell' layer, controls space between layers
LanguageData.EEAP.shellLastLayerPatchDesc: Effects apparel 'Shell' or higher, but lower than the 'Overhead' layer, controls what counts as 'Shell'
LanguageData.EEAP.shellYSpacePatchDesc: Effects apparel 'Shell' or higher, but lower than the 'Overhead' layer, controls space between layers
LanguageData.EEAP.overheadLastLayerPatchDesc: Effects apparel useing the 'Overhead' layer or higher, controls what counts as 'Overhead'
LanguageData.EEAP.overheadYSpacePatchDesc: Effects apparel useing the 'Overhead' layer or higher, controls space between layers
